SEARCH
Package hu.bme.mit.theta.solver

Interface Solver

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, SolverBase
All Known Subinterfaces:
HornSolver
All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericHornSolver, GenericSmtLibHornSolver, NullSolver, SmtLibSolver, SolverValidatorWrapper
public interface Solver extends SolverBase
Common interface for SMT solvers.

Use the add(Expr) methods to add expressions to the solver. Then use SolverBase.check() method to check their satisfiability. The result can be queried by SolverBase.getStatus(). If the expressions are satisfiable, a satisfying assignment can be obtained by SolverBase.getModel().

The solver can also support incremental solving by SolverBase.push() and SolverBase.pop().
